data.name: Privacy Statement
data.value: Privacy Policy

data.name: We are committed to protecting your privacy.
data.value: We are committed to protecting your privacy.

data.name: Last updated: May 10, 2025
data.value: Last updated: 10 May 2025

data.name: AnduinOS is a free and open-source Linux distribution based on Ubuntu.
data.value: AnduinOS is a free and open-source Linux distribution based on Ubuntu.

data.name: 1. Data Collection by AnduinOS
data.value: 1. Data Collection by AnduinOS

data.name: AnduinOS itself does not collect, transmit, or store any user data.
data.value: AnduinOS itself does not collect, transmit, or store any user data.

data.name: This document explains how AnduinOS handles user data, clarifies its technical design regarding privacy, and outlines considerations related to upstream components.
data.value: This document explains how AnduinOS handles user data, clarifies its technical design regarding privacy, and outlines considerations related to upstream components.

data.name: There are no hidden background processes or network communications initiated by the system for the purpose of gathering user information.
data.value: The system initiates no hidden background processes or network communications for the purpose of gathering user information.

data.name: All system operations, configurations, and user activities take place locally on your own device ("local execution").
data.value: All system operations, configurations, and user activities take place locally on your own device ("local execution").

data.name: AnduinOS does not include any telemetry, analytics, advertising, tracking, or behavior profiling mechanisms.
data.value: AnduinOS does not include any telemetry, analytics, advertising, tracking, or behaviour profiling mechanisms.

data.name: 2. Why Local Execution Matters
data.value: 2. Why Local Execution Matters

data.name: entirely on your computer
data.value: entirely on your computer

data.name: Local execution means that all features and services of AnduinOS are performed
data.value: Local execution means that all features and services of AnduinOS are carried out

data.name: Thus, AnduinOS is fundamentally privacy-preserving by design.
data.value: Therefore, AnduinOS is fundamentally privacy-preserving by design.

data.name: This ensures:
data.value: This ensures:

data.name: , without requiring communication with any external servers owned by us or third parties.
data.value: , without requiring communication with any external servers owned by us or third parties.

data.name: Control:
data.value: Control:

data.name: You retain complete control over your personal data.
data.value: You retain complete control over your personal data.

data.name: Transparency:
data.value: Transparency:

data.name: Security:
data.value: Security:

data.name: No data leaves your machine without your explicit action.
data.value: No data leaves your machine without your explicit action.

data.name: Reducing external communications limits exposure to interception or exploitation risks.
data.value: Limiting external communications reduces exposure to the risk of interception or exploitation.

data.name: In a world where remote telemetry has become ubiquitous, AnduinOS deliberately minimizes external dependencies to protect users.
data.value: In a world where remote telemetry has become ubiquitous, AnduinOS deliberately minimises external dependencies to protect users.

data.name: The open nature of AnduinOS empowers users to independently verify that the system respects their privacy.
data.value: The open-source nature of AnduinOS enables users to independently verify that the system respects their privacy.

data.name: There are no proprietary blobs or closed modules outside of upstream dependencies explicitly inherited from Ubuntu.
data.value: There are no proprietary blobs or closed-source modules beyond the upstream dependencies explicitly inherited from Ubuntu.

data.name: You can share AnduinOS, either modified or unmodified, under the same license terms.
data.value: You may share AnduinOS, whether modified or unmodified, under the same licence terms.

data.name: While AnduinOS itself does not collect any data,
data.value: Whilst AnduinOS itself does not collect any data,

data.value: You can adjust the code to suit your requirements, including removing any components you do not trust.

data.value: To check for and download system updates, AnduinOS connects to our update endpoint at

data.name: No data leaves your machine without your explicit action or for essential functionality.
data.value: No data leaves your machine without your explicit action or for essential functionality.

data.name: This connection is essential for keeping your system secure and up-to-date. As with any standard HTTPS connection, this process will expose your IP address to our server.

data.name: While AnduinOS is designed for local-first operation, certain features require network access to function. These connections are not used for telemetry, but they do involve communication with external servers, which is an unavoidable requirement for these services to operate and will expose your IP address.
data.value: Whilst AnduinOS is designed for local-first operation, certain features require network access to function. These connections are not used for telemetry, but they do involve communication with external servers, which is an unavoidable requirement for these services to operate and will expose your IP address.
